thread.title: Rosanna Iversen-Berdahl

author: Rosanna Iversen-Berdahl
title: Rosanna Iversen-Berdahl
text: I have only had one experience where I haven't been super thrilled and that was my fault for not meeting her first. And my only complaint is how unkempt the sitter's house was. College student who just could not have cared less. I have loved every person who has cared for my pet and used several of them again since I compete in martial arts in the same cities over and over. I was very pleased with the way Dog Vacay handlerld a situation in which a cat came into a sitter's yard and got into a scuffle with my dog. They were very concerned and proactive and ready to care for him. Thankfully he didn't need it. I also needed a refund once and it was taken care of right away. I would be lost without Dog Vacay to help watch my precious Tae Kwon Dontae during those few hours when I cannot whilst traveling with him. Most appreciative of their services! Thank you!
